name: Hooden Horse
description: A medium undead creature that embodies a spectral steed capable of hunting down wrongdoers, with notable physical prowess and eerie charm.
memorable: It regenerates health when defeating foes and can command submission, acting as a chilling arbiter of justice.
goals: To hunt down and exact justice upon wrongdoers connected to its creation.
relations: May be associated with other undead creatures or entities seeking vengeance.
environment: Typically found in locations tied to criminal activity or haunted areas.
strengths: High strength and charisma, allowing it to be both a great combatant and manipulative in social interactions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, possibly reducing its combat effectiveness against certain foes.
attacks: Uses the Blade of Retribution to inflict necrotic damage with a potential for psychic damage through its psychic manipulation effects.
most_powerful_ability: Harvest Life, allowing it to regain health by defeating its enemies.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 ft., allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Has a keen perception skill with a +5 modifier.
additional_information: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage.
Can charm opponents, forcing them to approach it.
Automatically locates wrongdoers associated with its creation.
Resilient to psychological effects, immune to being frightened or charmed.
Capable of making multiattacks in combat.
